Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I've been at Finest Spirits 2015 in Munich today. Well, it was absolutely delicate and awesome - I wanted to share this with you - for SCIENCE and stuff ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I didn't know about this great "experminent" until today, here are some details: [http://www.ardbeg.com/ardbeg/ardbeg-in-space](http://www.ardbeg.com/ardbeg/ardbeg-in-space)

![Nsn5XRx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Nsn5XRx.jpg)

![G1dpopR.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/G1dpopR.jpg)

And yes, its delicious.

Fjord
